Here is the list of signs in Line, along with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Strong and confident, but also impulsive and reckless.
2. Taurus - 7.5/10 - Reliable and practical, but also stubborn and resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, but also scattered and unpredictable.
4. Cancer - 8.5/10 - Nurturing and emotional, but also moody and overly sensitive.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Confident and charismatic, but also prideful and dominating.
6. Virgo - 7/10 - Analytical and hardworking, but also critical and perfectionistic.
7. Libra - 8.5/10 - Diplomatic and social, but also indecisive and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, but also secretive and manipulative.
9. Sagittarius - 9/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but also reckless and tactless.
10. Capricorn - 7.5/10 - Disciplined and responsible, but also rigid and controlling.
11. Aquarius - 8.5/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but also detached and rebellious.
12. Pisces - 9/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, but also dreamy and unclear.
Note: The scores are subjective and based on general characteristics associated with each sign.
